column4: Hi guys I am trying to see shares on a AS400 using samba.  Now I can view the shares when I list them in terminal but either using Dolphin in KDE or Nautilus in GNOME the directories and files show only question marks in there names and I see nothing in the directories at all
had same problem between linux/NFS for windows, the owner of the mount point was incorrect
I am using samba not NFS though
